        public void move(Direction direction,
        double pixels)
        Description copied from class: Shape
        Moves in the given direction. Moves pixels pixels in the given direction. Won't move through solid shapes.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        direction - the direction in which to move.
        pixels - the distance to move.

      • maxMovement

        public Point maxMovement(Point p,
                Shape s)
        Description copied from class: Shape
        Finds the farthest this shape can go towards a target with an obstacle in the way. If this shape tries to move to target, then obstacle may get in its way. Finds the farthest this shape can move towards target, and returns the location where the shape's center would be if it advanced as far as possible.
        Parameters:
        p - the point towards which this shape is moving.
        s - another shape which may obstruct this shape's movement.
        Returns:
        a point representing the farthest this shape's center can move towards target.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Shape s)
        Description copied from class: Shape
        Checks if this shape contains another given shape.
        Specified by:
        contains in class Shape
        Parameters:
        s - the shape that may be contained in this shape.
        Returns:
        true if s is entirely inside this shape, false otherwise.

        public void update()
        Description copied from class: Shape

        public void setup()
        Description copied from class: Shape
